index.title: Documentation
index.description: Welcome to the Live Chat documentation. Here you'll find everything you need to get started and manage your account.

intro.title: Live Chat Platform
intro.desc: Our platform empowers your team to deliver real-time support with ease. Featuring advanced AI automation, seamless team collaboration tools, and robust security, it is designed to scale with your business.

step1.title: Register an Account
step1.desc: Sign up for a free account to get started. You can also log in with your Google account.

step2.title: Create a Project
step2.desc: Create a workspace for your website. You can have multiple projects under one account.

step3.title: Embed the Widget
step3.desc: Copy the generated script tag and paste it into your website's HTML to start chatting with visitors immediately.

security.title: Security Features
security.description: Learn how to secure your account with Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) and manage sessions.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
twoFactor.desc: We highly recommend enabling 2FA to add an extra layer of security to your account.
twoFactor.step2: Click 'Enable 2FA' and scan the QR code with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator).
twoFactor.step3: Enter the verification code to confirm setup.
twoFactor.note: Make sure to save your recovery codes in a safe place.

password.title: Password Management
password.desc: Keep your account safe by using a strong, unique password.
password.reset: If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset it via email.
password.change: You can change your password at any time from your Profile settings.

management.title: Project Management
management.description: Guides on creating projects, inviting team members, and configuring settings.

projects.title: Creating & Managing Projects
projects.desc: Projects allow you to organize your conversations and settings for different websites or teams.
projects.create: To create a new project, go to the Projects page and click 'Create Project'.
projects.switch: You can switch between projects using the dropdown in the sidebar.

members.title: Team Members
members.desc: Invite your team to collaborate on resolving customer inquiries.

roles.title: Roles & Permissions
roles.owner: Owner: Full access to everything, including billing (if applicable).
roles.manager: Manager: Can manage settings, invite members, but cannot delete the project.
roles.agent: Agent: Can only view and reply to conversations.

members.invite: Go to Project Settings > Invite Members to send invitations via email.

audit.title: Audit Logs
audit.desc: Track important actions taken within your project for security and compliance.
audit.view: Navigate to Project Settings > Audit Logs to view the history of changes.

efficiency.title: Efficiency Tools
efficiency.description: Boost your productivity with Canned Responses and Action Templates.

canned.title: Canned Responses
canned.desc: Canned responses are pre-written messages that help agents answer common questions quickly.
canned.usage: Type '/' in the chat input to see a list of available shortcuts.
canned.manage: You can create, edit, and delete shortcuts in Project Settings > Canned Responses.

actions.title: Action Templates
actions.desc: Action templates are structured forms (e.g., 'Contact Info', 'Support Request') that agents can send to visitors during a conversation.
actions.usage: Agents select a template from the Action Panel, which then appears in the visitor's chat widget for them to fill out.
actions.manage: Define your custom forms and fields in Project Settings > Action Templates.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Leverage AI to provide 24/7 support even when your team is offline.

ai.title: AI Responder
ai.desc: The AI Responder automatically handles visitor inquiries when no support agents are online, ensuring your customers never wait for an answer.
ai.setup: To enable it, go to Project Settings > AI Responder. You can customize the AI's persona and knowledge using the System Prompt.
ai.persona: The System Prompt tells the AI how to behave (e.g., 'You are a helpful support agent for a shoe store').
ai.enable: Toggle 'Enable AI Responder' to allow the bot to take over during offline hours.

widget.title: Chat Widget Customization
widget.desc: Customize the look and feel of the chat widget to match your brand.
widget.customize: You can change the theme (Light/Dark), primary color, position, and welcome message in Project Settings > Widget Settings.
widget.embed: Once customized, copy the Embed Code and paste it into your website.
